mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.SMT) AS num , A.YEAR AS year , A.SMT AS smt , D.DEPT_NAME AS dept_name , C.STU_GRADE AS stu_grade , C.STU_NAME AS stu_name , B.SUB_NAME AS sub_name , B.SUB_CODE AS sub_code , P.PROF_NAME AS prof_name , A.GRADE AS grade , A.GRADE_P AS grade_p , E.OBJ_NO AS obj_no , CASE WHEN E.OBJ_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS obj_yn FROM RESULTS A INNER JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE INNER JOIN STUDENT C ON A.STU_NO = C.STU_NO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN PROFESSOR P ON P.PROF_NO = B.PROF_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN OBJECTION E ON A.SUB_CODE = E.SUB_CODE AND A.STU_NO = E.STU_NO WHERE A.YEAR = 2024 AND A.SMT = 1 AND A.STU_NO = #{studentno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OBJECTION (STU_NO, SUB_CODE, OBJ_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{stu_no},#{sub_code}, #{obj_content}, now())

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.SMT) AS num , A.YEAR AS year , A.SMT AS SMT , D.DEPT_NAME AS dept_name , C.STU_GRADE AS stu_grade , C.STU_NAME AS stu_name , C.STU_NO AS stu_no , B.SUB_NAME AS sub_name , B.SUB_CODE AS sub_code , P.PROF_NAME AS prof_name , A.GRADE AS grade , A.GRADE_P AS grade_p , E.OBJ_NO AS obj_no , E.OBJ_CONTENT AS obj_content FROM RESULTS A INNER JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE = B.SUB_CODE INNER JOIN STUDENT C ON A.STU_NO = C.STU_NO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN PROFESSOR P ON P.PROF_NO = B.PROF_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN OBJECTION E ON A.SUB_CODE = E.SUB_CODE AND A.STU_NO = E.STU_NO WHERE A.YEAR = 2024 AND A.SMT = 1 AND E.OBJ_NO IS NOT NULL AND A.SUB_CODE = #{sub_code} AND A.STU_NO = #{stu_no}
